summary: "Alien: Romulus" is a scary science fiction movie that came out in 2024. It's part of the "Alien" series and takes place after the events of the first two movies. The story follows six young people who are space colonists. They go to scavenge a broken-down space station and end up running into dangerous aliens. The movie was made by Fede √Ålvarez, who also directed other scary movies like "Don't Breathe." It stars Cailee Spaeny as the lead, along with other talented actors. People who saw the movie at CinemaCon liked it, and it made a lot of money worldwide.
title: Alien Romulus
